## Encoding benchmark

This code provide a benchmark for encoding data by encryption.

It compares if it's faster to encrypt a full JSON or encrypt each field of the JSON.
It also compares the decryption.

Herer the transaction JSON used:
```json
{
    "address": "addr", 
    "type": "1",
    "data": {
        "encrypted_wallet": "656e632077616c6c6574", 
    },
    "timestamp": "1549488623", 
    "publicKey": "3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004035187cb1b21b3cf24afa631c97e17e5a48d69d765d1ab82170508ecd6d376134bbbeba132d7c94041f4b0e374704544dd879639ca25d67f58d2f9a8b6862f73", 
    "signature": "304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854", 
    "em_signature": "304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854"
}
```


```diff
$ go run main.go
-----------------
ENCRYPT FULL JSON
-----------------

728
====> Encryption took 0.000308 seconds <====
-------------------
ENCRYPT JSON FIELDS
-------------------
{"address":"043e20a59661aef792d84457ed1ebe869faa7225b9ed2733bd0c54f86df18acc0b22b608d63ae063b1728bef2b9ac81cad2500a0c7f3ad7f7b304835484d021cf5f57afbec9586b64969a4dce1e35d94a68b726b7ad4cb5497738420455c89a7f85ced4e250fc8b34d25726be7a8476b4dde6fdcb7","data":{"encrypted_Wallet":"656e632077616c6c6574"},"em_signature":"","publicKey":"","signature":"","timestamp":"04be6a4188cdbdee9dc7869d3dff32c28b50ea21a1ecabf2a045b9ac54a20a0bb2bb562d2298ddda6b3687076a8ced4b42123fe91f6b2a3d8a8d212c96c1b29313abc877014000f81c537bcd2ce865f17162ace60940a1b24cf5242f0faa2ee21dfc50503cd4d407c883a978dfdcdb043c1488c55a72cf97250fc7","type":"0416e421a7fdbd90ce87fd7dd85178ceccf90f0c298857bdee4637f16bd094b204377ff67d88a197d85c4312768e317e37f41d99397d767707a294a308f36f91b1dfc7ba943354201c808bb30ea76bea71f522391121170b00717e66efe25e7571c21cba90810ffceb6bd6517c51e40a8c7f"}
2456
====> Encryption took 0.000756 seconds <====
-----------------
DECRYPT FULL JSON
-----------------
{"address":"addr","data":{"encrypted_Wallet":"656e632077616c6c6574"},"em_signature":"30450220580daa819875265b07c8baeca08228028eaeffdee772e1aca95ff2c2b2819d08022100f82d9dc5f6a69260f1b915ff9a66d760fd632e3d660c5a72a76d7b10265908b3","publicKey":"3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004c7d06c5c75626e33139998166d3e17d88481b11c6c6ca6e2063cf587b6ea94c4f00617e03d1945136c000b3227342c862e74655bff8fcdc318f4232613c64728","signature":"30450220580daa819875265b07c8baeca08228028eaeffdee772e1aca95ff2c2b2819d08022100f82d9dc5f6a69260f1b915ff9a66d760fd632e3d660c5a72a76d7b10265908b3","timestamp":1549489408,"type":1}

publicKey: 3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004c7d06c5c75626e33139998166d3e17d88481b11c6c6ca6e2063cf587b6ea94c4f00617e03d1945136c000b3227342c862e74655bff8fcdc318f4232613c64728
```
